snippet: The Philadelphia police have shown a pattern of wrongfully arresting people who videotaped officers in public, according to a federal lawsuit.
abstract: American Civil Liberties Union lawsuit says Philadelphia police have shown pattern of wrongfully arresting people who videotaped officers in public.
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia police have shown a pattern of wrongfully arresting people who videotaped officers in public, according to a federal lawsuit.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Police Accused of Retaliatory Arrests
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Police Accused of Retaliatory Arrests
